casebody.data:
Janell GOFFE, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
FOULKE MANAGEMENT CORP. t/a Cherry Hill Triplex/Cherry Hill Mitsubishi and Antonio (Tony) Salisbury, Defendants-Petitioners. Sasha Robinson and Tijuana Johnson, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
Mall Chevrolet, Inc., Defendant-Petitioner. M-41 September Term 2018
081258 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 28, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Coalition of Automotive Retailers for leave to appear amicus curiae is granted, limited solely to the brief that accompanied the motion. Should movant seek to participate in oral argument, it may file a motion seeking such relief.
